error.403.info.content:
If you think this is an error, please check:
‚Ä¢ Whether you are properly logged in
‚Ä¢ Whether your account has the appropriate permissions
‚Ä¢ Contact the website administrator for help
error.403.info.title: üîí Permission Information
error.403.message:
Sorry, you don't have permission to access this page.
Please check your login status or contact the administrator.
error.403.title: Access Denied
error.404.message:
Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist.
The link may have expired or the page has been moved.
error.404.title: Page Not Found
error.418.info.content:
HTTP 418 "I'm a Teapot" was originally an April Fool's joke in 1998, defined by RFC 2324.
It indicates that the server refuses to attempt to brew coffee with a teapot, because teapots can only be used to brew tea.
In 2014, this status code was officially included in the HTTP standard.
error.418.info.title: üçµ Teapot Knowledge
error.418.message:
I am a teapot and cannot brew coffee.
This HTTP status code was originally an April Fool's joke in 1998, but has now been officially included in the HTTP standard.
error.418.title: I'm a Teapot
error.500.info.content:
If you continue to encounter this issue, please:
‚Ä¢ Try again later
‚Ä¢ Clear browser cache
‚Ä¢ Contact technical support
error.500.info.title: üîß System Status
error.500.message:
Sorry, the server encountered an unexpected error.
Our technical team has been notified and is working to fix it.
error.500.title: Internal Server Error
error.503.info.content:
Expected maintenance time: about 30 minutes
Maintenance reason: System upgrade and performance optimization
Thank you for your patience!
error.503.info.title: üîß Maintenance Information
error.503.message:
Sorry, the server is under maintenance.
We are working to restore service, please try again later.
error.503.title: Service Temporarily Unavailable
error.teapot.knowledge.p1: HTTP 418 "I'm a Teapot" was originally an April Fool's joke in 1998, defined by RFC 2324.
error.teapot.knowledge.p2: It indicates that the server refuses to attempt to brew coffee with a teapot, as teapots can only be used for brewing tea.
error.teapot.knowledge.p3: In 2014, this status code was officially included in the HTTP standard.
error.teapot.knowledge.title: üçµ Teapot Knowledge
error.teapot.message1: I am a teapot and cannot brew coffee.
error.teapot.message2: This HTTP status code was originally an April Fool's joke in 1998, but has now officially become part of the HTTP standard.
error.teapot.title: I'm a Teapot

app.about.hero.desc: Wuhan University ¬∑ Course & Campus Navigation Platform
app.about.hero.name: WHU.sb Dev Team
app.about.markdown:
# About Us

Welcome to **WhuSB - Wuhan University Course Review Platform**!

We are committed to providing an open, transparent, and fair platform for course evaluation and communication for WHU students.

Here, you can:
- View detailed information about various courses
- Read real reviews from fellow students
- Share your own course experiences
- Provide references for course selection

Let's build a better learning environment together!
